name: Deep-Live-Cam
description: Installs Python environment and dependencies for Deep-Live-Cam (Windows + NVIDIA GPU)
author: Hamza

commands.name: Setup Environment
commands.cmd: python -m venv deeplive_env && .\deeplive_env\Scripts\activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip uninstall -y onnxruntime && pip install onnxruntime-gpu==1.16.3
